Genetic Distance Calculator

This Calculation is based on data from the following paper:

Palsson, G., Hardarson, M. T., Jonsson, H., Steinthorsdottir, V., Stefansson, O. A., Eggertsson, H. P., ... & Stefansson, K. (2025). Complete human recombination maps. Nature, 1-8. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-024-08450-5.

For more details, you can access the official GitHub repository where these files are hosted: deCODE GitHub Repository.
